extends java.lang.Object

      return the Location
      static boolean isInRange(double lng1, double lat1, double lng2, double lat2, long radius)
      return if lat1&lng1 is in the range of lat2&lng2, the range id a circle
      static double latitudeConverter(java.lang.String code)
      convert latitude string format into double format
      According to 3GPP TS 23.032 6.1
      static double longtitudeConverter(java.lang.String code)
      convert longitude string format into double format
      According to 3GPP TS 23.032 6.1
      static long radiusConverter(java.lang.String code)
      convert radius string format into long format
      According to 3GPP TS 23.032 6.5
      void start()
      start BaiduMap listener to get the updated location
      the max interval of listener is 10 and the minimum interval is 5
      void stop()
      stop the listener to get the updated location
